name: LD46 - Flare
description:
A unique coop puzzle game.  Can be played alone but is better with a friend.

Objective

Make it through the 3d maze before the time runs out and your flame fizzles out.

Challenge

Player 1 (top window) can only see the maze from a top view and player 2 (bottom window) can only see the maze from a side view.

Controls

ActionTop Down View/Top ScreenSide View/Bottom ScreenPauseEscape KeyEscape KeySwitch ControlsSpace BarSpace Bar
Leftleft arrowARightright arrowDUpup arrowWDowndown arrowS

Times are pretty crazy...  We're a husband and wife team finishing up our third game jam together.  We have two little kids who definitely add an extra level of difficulty to game dev in 72 hours but we wouldn't have it any other way!

Known Bugs

  • Player movement is allowed while game is paused
